metadata.title: CVE-2020-27221 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Eclipse OpenJ9 up to and including version 0.23, there is potential fora stack-based buffer overflow when the virtual machine or JNI natives areconverting from UTF-8 characters to platform encoding.

criterions.comment: eclipse: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
